    • newIncomingBlock

      public void newIncomingBlock​(B block)
      Description copied from class: AbstractConsensusAlgorithm
      When a new block is received by the node this function should be called. The consensus algorithm should take actions required accordingly to update the state of agreement.
      Specified by:
